overview.summary: Change the conductivity tensors in a field.

description.p: Given a HexVol of type int (data at cells) as input, send a HexVol of type int (data still at cells) as output -- the user should be able to specify a list of "mask-out" datavalues via a GuiVar -- all cells with any of those datavalues should be removed from the Field, and any nodes that are no longer attached to any cells should also, obviously, be removed at the end. The PropertyManager should be copied from the input field to the output field as should the remaining fdata values.
